medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced gradual onset of dull and aching pain the night prior to admission, which began after eating. The pain radiates across the abdomen to the epigastric region. She has had nausea and vomiting. No fevers, diarrhea, black stools, chest pain, or shortness of breath were reported.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of liver or gallbladder disease.
